title: FILLTTMM - Wear watch face
summary: FILLTTMM watch face app for Android Wear
description: FILLTTMM is a designer watchface app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. Minutes fill an hourly grid. Hours stand above it. How do you fill the time?Compatible with Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3Idea & design : Albert SalamonAndroid programming : Michał Żyliński© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
descriptionHTML:
FILLTTMM is a designer watchface app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. Minutes fill an hourly grid. Hours stand above it. How do you fill the time?

Compatible with Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3

Idea & design : Albert Salamon
Android programming : Michał Żyliński

© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
comments: Would like to see an option to add the date (just simple "APR 9, 2015") somewhere below or above the clock.
